infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Waldo Health needs camera access to capture photos of workplace exposures for ACC documentation.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Waldo Health needs photo library access to attach existing photos to exposure records.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Waldo Health needs your location to automatically record where exposures occurred.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Waldo Health needs microphone access for hands-free voice entry when documenting exposures.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Waldo Health uses speech recognition to convert your voice descriptions into exposure records.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Waldo Health to access your camera to document workplace exposures.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Waldo Health to use your location to record where exposures occurred.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Waldo Health to use your microphone for voice entry.
